name: Wizard Challenge Word Search for Harry Potter
name_original: Wizard Challenge Word Search for Harry Potter
description:
Best new FREE word search puzzle game in 2017! Challenge your brain with addictive & fun puzzles! Full of themes to suit your every mood!

Are you a Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry Alumni?

Relive your favorite adventures with this fun word game that will put your Harry Potter knowledge to the test!

Find the hidden words with your fingers in Word Search

Here's what we have:

- Easy choosing letters
- Unlimited puzzles
- Brilliant colorful look
- Lots of other puzzles to choose from!
- More than 15 categories.
- Thousands of words organized in categories
- Play for yourself against the clock, earn stars as you discover and swipe more words.
- Replay categories to beat your own high-score!
- Hints to avoid frustrations
- This game is suitable for boys, for girls, and adults.

WARNING: Playing this game may challenge your brain and improve your word power :)

Download Now this amazing game of Word Search Puzzles and Enjoy Now!!!
